Wesley Wales "Wes" Anderson (born May 1, 1969) is an American movie director and screenwriter.
Wes Anderson in 2015 he designed the Prada Cafè Bar Luce of Milano for the Italian luxury company Prada, as it was in a fifties years film to recall the iconic design of Milan's design palaces of that era.
He was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay for "The Royal Tenenbaums" in 2001 and "Moonrise Kingdom" in 2012, and for the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature for "Fantastic Mr. Fox" in 2009.
